content.description: A horizontal disk is free to rotate about an axle at its center. The labeled arrows in the figure represent forces of equal magnitude that are exerted on the edge of the disk in the directions shown.
content.question: Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitudes of the torques <math alttext="tau sub A" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="tau sub B" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>C</mi></msub></math>, and <math alttext="tau sub D" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>τ</mi> <mi>D</mi> </msub> </math> about the axle by forces <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>, and <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="tau sub A equals tau sub B, which equals tau sub C, which equals tau sub D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>D</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub A is greater than tau sub D, which is greater than open parenthesis, tau sub B equals tau sub C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, tau sub A equals tau sub B, which equals tau sub D, close parenthesis, which is greater than tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>C</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, tau sub B equals tau sub C, close parenthesis, is greater than tau sub D, which is greater than tau sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="tau sub A is greater than tau sub D, which is greater than open parenthesis, tau sub B equals tau sub C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
